name: Harold And The Magic Drawer
description:
Harold and the Magic Drawer is a game about causing chaos. Using the tools in your trusty magic drawer, you can destroy desks, raise the spirit of your coworkers, and most of all, make them want to PARTY! But be careful--your boss will do whatever it takes to stop your little destruction spree. It's up to you to stay one step ahead of him, and let chaos rule your workplace.

Controls:

WASD to Move

Left Click To Destroy

Right Click To Open Drawer

Middle Click To Pick Up Items

Alternate Controls (for those who don't have a mouse)

Arrow Keys To Move

'C' To Destroy

'Z' to Open Drawer

'X' To Pick Up Items

Made by Enmanuel Zambrano and Natalie Baublitz
